subject: Q4 Marketing Campaign - Action Required
body:
Hi Team,

We need to finalize the Q4 marketing campaign strategy by next Friday. Please review the attached deck and provide your feedback. Key deliverables:

1. Budget allocation for social media ads
2. Content calendar for November-December
3. KPI targets and success metrics

Looking forward to your inputs.

Best,
Sarah

subject: Website Redesign Project Update
body:
Hello,

The website redesign is progressing well. However, we need design approval on the new homepage mockups by Wednesday. Can you please review and approve so we can move forward with development?

Also, we need content for the About Us page updated by Nov 20th.

Thanks,
Mike

subject: Team Performance Review - November
body:
Dear Team Lead,

It's time for the monthly performance reviews. Please complete the review forms for your team members by November 18th. Access the review portal at hr.company.com/reviews.

Reminder: 1-on-1 meetings should be scheduled before submitting the forms.

Regards,
HR Team

subject: Client Meeting Follow-up - Action Items
body:
Hi everyone,

Great meeting with the client today! Here are the action items:

- Prepare product demo for next week's presentation
- Send pricing proposal by Thursday
- Schedule technical deep-dive session with their IT team
- Update project timeline based on new requirements

Let me know if you have any questions.

Jessica

subject: Urgent: Server Maintenance Window
body:
URGENT NOTICE

Scheduled server maintenance on Saturday, Nov 18th from 2 AM - 6 AM EST. All services will be temporarily unavailable.

Action required:
- Notify your team members
- Schedule any critical tasks outside this window
- Backup important work before Friday EOD

Contact IT if you have concerns.

IT Ops Team

subject: Budget Report Due Next Week
body:
Hello,

Your Q4 budget report is due on November 22nd. Please include:
- Actual spend vs. projected budget
- Variance analysis
- Q1 2026 budget forecast

Use the standard template from the finance portal.

Thank you,
Finance Team

subject: Training Session: New CRM Platform
body:
Dear Team,

Mandatory training on the new CRM platform is scheduled for November 21st at 2 PM. Please:

1. Register via the training portal by Nov 17th
2. Complete the pre-training module
3. Bring any questions you have about the new system

Attendance is mandatory for all sales and support staff.

Training Team

subject: Project Milestone Deadline - Nov 25
body:
Team,

Reminder that our project milestone is due November 25th. We need to deliver:

- Complete API documentation
- Unit test coverage above 80%
- Integration testing completed
- Deployment scripts ready

Let's have a checkpoint meeting on Nov 20th to ensure we're on track.

David
